net.javachallenge.api

Class GameSettingBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.javachallenge.api.GameSettingBuilder

  • public class GameSettingBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameSettingBuilder class is used to initialize the settings of the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameSettingBuilder()
      Constructs a GameSettingBuilder with default settings.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameSetting build()
      Returns a GameSetting instance with the settings of this instance.

      Returns the alien trade margin.

      Return the initial amount of money.

      Returns the size of an edge of the map in tiles number.

      Returns the maximum number of rounds in a game.
      int getVeinCount()
      Returns the number of veins on the field.

      Set the initial amount of money.
